scripts.build: npm run clean && babel . -d ./build/.tmp --ignore node_modules && npm run compress
scripts.self-publish: npm run build && rm -rf ./build/.tmp && cp {package.json,LICENSE,yarn.lock} build && cd build && npm publish # @TODO
scripts.compress: for e in $(ls ./build/.tmp); do uglifyjs ./build/.tmp/$e --compress --mangle -o ./build/$e; done;
